originalText.text: Amazing school.  A real gem in Washington Heights.  The Principal is an incredible leader and all the teachers set high expectations for the students (in Spanish and in English).  They provide a caring environment that encourages family participation and have many family events throughout the year.  I could not be more appreciative of everything they have done for our family.  A bonus is they have an incredible Lego Robotics team and a pretty robust and affordable after-school program.  They also offer art, dance, science, and music!  They have partnerships with the Bronx Zoo, Studio in the Schools, Make it Better, and so much more!

originalText.text: My brother has had awesome safe and fun learning experiences in this school. This year will be his last year and I am so proud of how well he has learned to speak read and write in both Spanish and english. I love the parent involvement and the staff! I definitely recommend this school to anyone.

originalText.text: Great dual language (English & Spanish) elementary school. Shares building with PS132. Nice diversity, family oriented school.
